faq.question: 奥氮平用于治疗哪些疾病？
faq.answer: 奥氮平用于治疗精神分裂症和双相情感障碍。

faq.question: 使用奥氮平有哪些常见副作用？
faq.answer: 常见副作用包括体重增加、嗜睡、头晕。

label_excerpt.content: 成人起始剂量为每天5-10毫克，根据患者反应逐渐调整，最大不超过20毫克/日。

literature.title: Efficacy of Olanzapine in Bipolar Disorder: A Meta-Analysis
literature.abstract: Olanzapine has demonstrated significant efficacy in treating manic episodes in bipolar disorder, with notable improvement in symptoms and relapse prevention.

faq.question: 帕罗西汀的主要用途是什么？
faq.answer: 用于治疗抑郁症、焦虑症、强迫症和创伤后应激障碍。

faq.question: 服用帕罗西汀有哪些注意事项？
faq.answer: 避免突然停药，可能会出现头晕、恶心等停药反应，应遵医嘱逐步减量。

label_excerpt.content: 常见不良反应包括恶心、口干、出汗增加、性欲减退、失眠等。

literature.title: Comparative Effectiveness of SSRIs: Focus on Paroxetine
literature.abstract: Paroxetine, a selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor, is effective for major depressive disorder and anxiety disorders, though it may cause notable withdrawal symptoms.

faq.question: 阿司匹林可以预防心脏病吗？
faq.answer: 低剂量阿司匹林可用于预防心肌梗死和中风，尤其适用于高风险患者。

faq.question: 阿司匹林有哪些禁忌？
faq.answer: 胃溃疡、出血性疾病患者禁用阿司匹林；也不推荐儿童使用以免诱发瑞氏综合征。

label_excerpt.content: 对水杨酸盐类过敏、有出血倾向或活动性消化道溃疡者禁用。

literature.title: Low-Dose Aspirin in Primary Prevention: A Review
literature.abstract: Aspirin remains a cornerstone in secondary prevention of cardiovascular disease. In primary prevention, benefits must be balanced against bleeding risk.

faq.question: 美托洛尔适用于哪些疾病？
faq.answer: 用于治疗高血压、心绞痛、心律失常和心肌梗死后的维持治疗。

faq.question: 使用美托洛尔应注意什么？
faq.answer: 使用时应监测心率与血压，心动过缓者慎用；不得突然停药以免诱发心绞痛或心律失常。

label_excerpt.content: 应逐渐减量停药，避免突然中断治疗；心功能不全患者使用需严密监测。

literature.title: Role of Metoprolol in Post-Myocardial Infarction Therapy
literature.abstract: Metoprolol reduces mortality in patients post-MI by lowering heart rate and myocardial oxygen demand. Its beta-1 selectivity makes it well-tolerated in most patients.

faq.question: 苯海拉明的用途有哪些？
faq.answer: 常用于缓解过敏症状、打喷嚏、流鼻涕，也可用于短期失眠和晕动病。

faq.question: 苯海拉明有哪些副作用？
faq.answer: 可能引起嗜睡、口干、视力模糊，老年人慎用以避免认知障碍和跌倒风险。

label_excerpt.content: 不建议连续使用超过7天，驾驶及操作机械时需注意其镇静作用。

literature.title: Sedative Effects of Diphenhydramine and Antihistamine Use in the Elderly
literature.abstract: Diphenhydramine is widely used for allergic conditions and insomnia, but has anticholinergic side effects that may impair cognition, particularly in the elderly.
